original_text: I want him to tell you what is happening to us, so that you will feel stronger. That is the reason why I am sending him to you.
korean_text: 내가 그를 특별히 너희에게 보내는 것은 너희로 우리 사정을 알게 하고 너희 마음을 위로하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: I want him to tell you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그에게 너희에게 말하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: so that you will feel stronger
why I am sending him to you
